title: [CreeperCraftCity] SS Traffic
author: LocusAzzurro
txt_content:
SS TrafficSS Traffic求中文翻译，因为不艹舰不是很懂
 作品介绍 
SS Traffic是白星航运公司的一艘补给船，与SS Nomadic同一舰队。她由哈兰德与沃尔夫造船厂为白星航运公司在贝尔法斯特建造，以跟随奥林匹克级豪华游艇。SS Traffic在首航时为泰坦尼克号运送了三等舱乘客。她曾是一艘白星航运集团的补给船，在1917到1919年期间在法国海军担任了扫雷船，并且在第一次世界大战末期协助了战舰。在战争之后，她被卖给了Société Cherbourgeoise Transbordement，随后被重命名为Ingénieur Reibell。
她在1940年德国进攻法国时被法国沉没，但是被德国回收制作成了一艘沿海武装舰，直到1941年被德国拆除。

SS Traffic was a tender of the White Star Line, and the fleetmate to the SS Nomadic. She was built for the White Star Line by Harland and Wolff, at Belfast, to serve the luxury Olympic-class ocean liners. SS Traffic ferried some of the third class passengers to RMS Titanic for her maiden voyage. She served as a tender for White Star, as a minesweeper for the French Navy between 1917 and 1919, and supported troop ships at the end of the First World War. After the war she was sold to Société Cherbourgeoise Transbordement, and later renamed Ingénieur Reibell. 
She was scuttled by the French as the Germans invaded in 1940, but was salvaged and used by the Germans as an armed coastal vessel until being dismantled by the Germans in 1941.
